@So basically FTB is Mod Manager?@
@And what mods do you recommend me?@[/bq]
Thaumcraft is fun.  You're a wizard Gizoid.
Galacticraft is fun. "I'M IN SPACE!"

Thaumcraft and Galacticraft are really good cause you don't need to understand any mods cause they were originally standalone mods.

While in game while checking your inventory type the mod and it will give you a full list of in game items.
